description: Assisting in lecture, project, and exam development for CS300 Computer Systems including hosting weekly sections/office hours, grading, and student support on EdStem
Developed custom pages and custom AI post-recommendation algorithm for GliaLink, a platform to connect students with labs and research faculty
Developing end-to-end multimodal AI models using RL and LLM fine-tuning to improve surgery prediction and planning, with planned deployment to Rhode Island Hospital
Designed and built AI inventory assistant using MCP and LangChain to find root causes of supply chain issues, reducing issue resolution time by 60% at Chick-fil-A
Developed custom queueing algorithm to manage delivery scheduling to warehouses, saving Chick-fil-A 12 hours per week in planning (published in peer-reviewed journal IJORIS)
